text: Maila Nurmi (11 December 1922 â€“ 10 January 2008) was a Finnish-American actress. She was born Maila Elizabeth Syrjaniemi in Petsamo, Finland. She created the character Vampira in the 1950s. She played Vampira in Ed Wood's Plan 9 from Outer Space. She also played Vampira in the 1959 movie The Beat Generation. == Gallery == File:Vampira in docu SCHLOCK!.jpg|Maila Nurmi 2001.
